pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:0.5: 83. The training rule on one year
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.2: At that time the nuns were giving the full admission to two women per year,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.3: and the nuns’ dwelling place still did not have sufficient capacity.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.5: “How can the nuns give the full admission to two women per year,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.6: when the nuns’ dwelling place still doesn’t have sufficient capacity?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.7: The nuns heard the complaints of those people.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.8: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.9: “How can nuns give the full admission to two women per year?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.10: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.14: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.15: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.16.1: ‘If a nun gives the full admission to two women in one year, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.1.7: Gives the full admission to two women:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.1.8: gives the full ordination to two women.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.1.9: If, intending to give the full admission to two women, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastic boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.1.10: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.1.11: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.1.12: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.1.13: and the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.2.2: if she gives the full admission to one woman every other year;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.2.4: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.2.5: The thirteenth training rule is finished.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.2.6: The eighth sub-chapter on unmarried girls is finished.
